languages.text: {n}От расслабленного лица Лорд-инквизитора исходит странное ощущение угрозы. Он будто хищник, вышедший на охоту, но до поры скрывающийся в зарослях лицемерных улыбок и светской болтовни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}От расслабленного лица Лорда-инквизитора исходит странное ощущение угрозы. Он будто хищник, вышедший на охоту, но до поры скрывающийся в зарослях лицемерных улыбок и светской болтовни.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}От расслабленного лица Лорд-инквизитора исходит странное ощущение угрозы. Он будто хищник, вышедший на охоту, но до поры скрывающийся в зарослях лицемерных улыбок и светской болтовни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of threat. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, who was previously hiding in the brush of fake smiles and mingling.{/n}
{n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of threat. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, who was previously hiding in the brush of fake smiles and mingling.{/n}

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — until now.{/n}

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — until now.{/n}
{n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターはくつろいだ表情で脅迫的な雰囲気を放っている。獲物を求める捕食者さながらで、偽の笑顔と上品な会話で隠すことにしていたようだ…今までは。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターはくつろいだ表情で脅迫的な雰囲気を放っている。獲物を求める捕食者さながらで、偽の笑顔と上品な会話で隠すことにしていたようだ…今までは。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管大审判官的表情闲适，但却始终散发着某种古怪的威胁感。他就像掠食者一般，潜伏在在虚假的微笑与优雅的言谈之中，此刻终于露出了真正的面目。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管审判长的表情闲适，但却始终散发着某种古怪的威胁感。他就像掠食者一般，潜伏在在虚假的微笑与优雅的言谈之中，此刻终于露出了真正的面目。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La expresión relajada del Lord Inquisidor desprende una extraña sensación de amenaza. Parece un depredador al acecho, contentándose con esperar entre los matorrales de falsas sonrisas y conversaciones elegantes... por ahora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La expresión relajada del Lord Inquisidor desprende una extraña sensación de amenaza. Parece un depredador al acecho, contentándose con esperar entre los matorrales de falsas sonrisas y conversaciones elegantes... hasta ahora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré son air détendu, le seigneur inquisiteur est comme entouré d'une étrange aura menaçante. Il vous fait penser à un prédateur en chasse, qui s'était jusque-là contenté de se cacher derrière un mur de faux semblants. Mais le temps des sourires feints et des conversations hypocrites semble révolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré son air détendu, le seigneur inquisiteur est comme entouré d'une étrange aura menaçante. Il vous fait penser à un prédateur en chasse, qui s'était jusque-là contenté de se cacher derrière un mur de faux semblants. Mais le temps des sourires feints et des conversations hypocrites semble révolu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der entspannte Gesichtsausdruck des Großinquisitors wirkt seltsam bedrohlich. Er ähnelt einem Raubtier auf der Jagd und verbirgt sich hinter einem Gebüsch aus falschem Lächeln und eleganter Konversation – vorläufig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der entspannte Gesichtsausdruck des Großinquisitors wirkt merkwürdig bedrohlich. Er ähnelt einem Raubtier auf der Jagd und verbirgt sich hinter einem Gebüsch aus falschem Lächeln und eleganter Konversation – bis jetzt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun rahat yüz ifadesinden tuhaf bir tehdit hissi yayılıyor. Av peşindeki bir avcı misali şimdilik sahte gülümsemeler ve zarif sohbetler arasında saklanmaya razı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's relaxed expression radiates an odd sense of menace. He is akin to a predator on the prowl, content to hide in the brush of fake smiles and elegant conversation — for now.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncunun rahat yüz ifadesinden, tuhaf bir tehdit hissi yayılıyor. Av peşindeki bir avcı misali, şimdilik sahte gülümsemeler ve zarif sohbetlerin arasında saklanmaya razı.{/n}
